segments.text: Well , what did you think about the last candidate ? Do you think we should hire her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She had a very impressive resume , but she seemed to lack the confidence that I think a good manager needs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What made you think that she wasn't very confident ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you notice the way that she avoided making eye contact with us while she talked ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She was a bit nervous , I guess . What else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When she first walked into the room to greet us , she didn't shake our hands or introduce herself at all . I thought that was a bit unprofessional .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right . If she walked into meeting with our clients like that , it would make our company look bad , wouldn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sure would . Did you also notice the way she slouched in her chair during most of the interview ? She had horrible posture !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree . I guess I was paying more attention to her answers than her body language .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On top of that , she didn't seem to have any sense of people's personal space.She didn't keep enough distance between us during the meeting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's true . I guess we ’ ll have to keep looking for a manager then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry , we ’ ll find someone eventually !
segments.speaker: S2
